text: So manga monapik a manga mama, go so manga monapik a manga babay, na so sabaad kiran na pd ko sabaad: Ipzogo iran so marata, go ipzapar iran so mapiya, go gagamakn iran a manga lima iran (ka di siran phammgay). Piyakalipatan iran so Allah; na piyakalipatan siran mambo o Allah. Mataan! a so manga monapik na siran so manga pasik
